<s0>These differ mostly around the ability to debug the application on a secure (non dev) devices, and how the APK is signed.</s0><br1><br2>The debug version is signed with a key/certificate that is created automatically with a known name/password (to prevent required prompt during the build).
<s0>这两个版本的不同，大多是围绕在调试一个安全的（非开发版的）设备的能力，以及 apk 怎么签名。</s0><br1><br2>调试版本使用自动创建的密钥/证书签名，并且密钥/证书的用户名/密码是已知的（以防止构建过程中需要相关的信息）的。

A marker is a special attribute, in the tools namespace, used to express a specific decision for how to resolve conflicts.
标记是在工具（tools）命名空间中的一个特别的属性，用来描述对如何解决冲突所采取的决定。

Because it’s not possible to build an APK that does not have an associated <i0>Build Type</i0>, the APK is always configured with two (or more) configurations: <b1>compile</b1> and <f2><buildtype>Compile</f2>.<br3><s4>Creating a new </s4><i5>Build Type</i5><s6> automatically creates a new configuration based on its name.</s6><br7><br8>This can be useful if the debug version needs to use a custom library (to report crashes for instance), while the release doesn’t, or if they rely on different versions of the same library.<br9>

We previously saw that each <i0>Build Type</i0> creates its own <f1>assemble<name></f1> task, but that <i2>Build Variants</i2> are a combination of <i3>Build Type</i3> and <i4>Product Flavor</i4>.<br5><br6>When <i7>Product Flavors</i7> are used, more assemble-type tasks are created.

When a higher priority element does not define an attribute which has a default value of X, if a lower priority element defines that very attribute with the same value X, it will still be added to the merged element (with value X of course) since it represents a clear choice from the library to not consider this value as the default value but the right value for the feature (in case the default ever changes).</s3>
当一个较高优先级的元素没有定义默认值为X的属性时，如果一个较低优先级的元素也恰好定义了一个值同样是X的属性，那么这个属性仍然会被添加到合并的元素中 （当然它的值是X）， 因为它表示了类库对这个属性的值的一个明确的选择，从而不去考虑把默认值作为它的值，而是为某特性设置一个正确的值（以防默认值发生改变）。</s3>
When an attribute value contains a placeholder (see format below), the manifest merger will swap this placeholder value with an injected value.
当属性值包含一个占位符 （见下面的格式）时，合并工具将把此占位符的值换成一个注入的值。
When conflicts arise between elements to be merged, some markers must be explicitly added to guide the Manifest Merger.
当要合并的元素之间存在冲突时，必须显式添加一些标记来指导清单合并工具（Manifest Marger）。

With 3 ABIs and two versions of the application, 6 APKs needs to be generated (not counting the variants introduced by the different <i4>Build Types</i4>).<br5>However, the code of the paid version is the same for all three ABIs, so creating simply 6 flavors is not the way to go.<br6>Instead, there are two dimensions of flavors, and variants should automatically build all possible combinations.<br7><br8>This feature is implemented using Flavor Dimensions.

这个应用程序带有三个ABI和两种版本，就需要生成6个APK（不计算由不同的<i4>Build Types</i4>引入的variants）。<br5>然而，对这三种ABI来说付费版本的代码是相同的，因此创建6个flavors来实现并不是一个好办法。<br6>相反，使用两个维度的flavor，并且variant应该自动构建所有可能的组合。<br7><br8>这个功能是使用Flavor Dimensions来实现的。
